sqlMap.select: SELECT SUM(dw.cost) AS cost, dw.personId AS personId, dw.personName AS personName, #value# AS month FROM Dispatch d, DispatchWork dw WHERE dw.dispatchId = d.dispatchId AND d.dispatchDay >= #value#*100 AND d.dispatchDay <= #value#*100+31 GROUP BY dw.personId

SELECT dw.personId AS personId, dw.personName AS personName, d.dispatchDay AS day, dw.cost AS cost, dw.startTime as startTime, dw.endTime as endTime FROM Dispatch d, DispatchWork dw WHERE dw.dispatchId = d.dispatchId AND personId = #personId# AND d.dispatchDay >= #month#*100 AND d.dispatchDay <= #month#*100+31
